amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 103 which prohibits the use of Federal funds for abortion services for women in Federal prison.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 103 of the bill. Section 103 prohibits use of Federal funds for abortion except where the life of the mother would be endangered if the fetus were carried to term, or in the case of rape.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 268 (Roll no. 373).
